This document presents the primary analyses of the VIBRANT trial. Currently, this runs on blinded data, and population flags have not yet been fully accounted for.


## Loading the data


```{r}

mae_files <- 
  fs::dir_ls(str_c(data_dir(), "03 QCed MAEs/"), regexp = "mae_full_.*\\.rds$") |> 
  sort(decreasing = TRUE) |>
  magrittr::extract(1)

mae <- readRDS(mae_files)

rm(mae_files)

```
